msbt.message: Why, look who it is! The one and only , in the flesh!What a lovely surprise to see you again. And here of all places!Wouldn't you know, I JUST moved to this island.I've been a teensy bit nervous about starting a new life, but seeing your friendly face has raised my spirits!

? Is that you? My word, what ARE you doing here?Enjoying all that has to offer, I hope?Funny storyI live here now! It's true, darling! This island suits me quite nicely, I think. Anyhoo, it's so lovely to run into you. I'd love to chat again, so please don't be a stranger, !

Hmmhaven't we met somewhere before? <10_4 />Of course! I remember now! You're , no? You remember me, don't you? It's me, , darling! And I've JUST moved to this island. Right now I'm up to my eyebrows in unpacking, but do come see me again so we can have a proper chat!
Oh my! Are you, by any chance ?I don't know if you remember me, but I'm . You seem to be doing well as ever!I live here on this island now, so stop by anytime to say hello, !
